articles.title: Taapsee Pannu brings a modern twist to the traditional saree at the Paris 2024 Olympics - The Times of India
articles.description: Taapsee Pannu makes heads turn as she ditches a blouse for a waistcoat in a modern saree look.
articles.content: For her glam makeup, Taapsee opted for nude eyeshadow, kohl eyes, smudged eyeliner, darkened brows, blushed cheeks, and a shade of matte pink lipstick.
